mapper.sql: QYID, RYID, HYLBDM, HYLB, CYRYBH, CYRYLBDM, CYRYLBMC, XM, QM, BM, XMPY, GJDM, GJ, MZDM, MINZU, XBDM, XB, CSRQ, HYZKDM, HYZK, SHENGAO, TIZH, HJDXZQH, HJDXZQHDM, HJDXZ, CYZJDM, CYZJ, ZJHM, ZZZHM, ZZDZ, GWBH, GWMC, GWZRMS, SHOUJI, LXDH, JJLXR, JJLXRDH, GZDM, GZ, ZHIWU, RZRQ, CYRYZTDM, CYRYZT, ZXR, ZXBZ, ZXSJ, LRSJ, LRR, LRDWBM, LRDWMC, HCDW, HCR, HCSJ, ZXYY, ZKZT, BCSJ, DCBS, BZ, SCBZ, BIDUIFLAG, ZPWTGYY, ZT, LZRQ, XXDM, XX, CYLBDM, CYLB, WHCDDM, WHCD, YJBZ, YJSJ, XZDXZQH, XZDXZQHDM, DJRQ, HJLBDM, HJLBMC, ZZMMDM, ZZMMMC, SBZT, ZYJNZSH, KDYWYZYZGZHM, SFYSPK

pub_qyjbxx.HYLB,pub_qyjbxx.QYMC,pub_qyjbxx.GXDWMC,pub_qyjbxx.QYBM,pub_qyryxx.QYID, pub_qyryxx.RYID, pub_qyjbxx.HYLBDM, pub_qyjbxx.HYLB, pub_qyryxx.CYRYBH, pub_qyryxx.CYRYLBDM, pub_qyryxx.CYRYLBMC, pub_qyryxx.XM, pub_qyryxx.QM, pub_qyryxx.BM, pub_qyryxx.XMPY, pub_qyryxx.GJDM, pub_qyryxx.GJ,pub_qyryxx.MZDM, pub_qyryxx.MINZU, pub_qyryxx.XBDM, pub_qyryxx.XB, pub_qyryxx.CSRQ, pub_qyryxx.HYZKDM, pub_qyryxx.HYZK, pub_qyryxx.SHENGAO, pub_qyryxx.TIZH, pub_qyryxx.HJDXZQH, pub_qyryxx.HJDXZQHDM, HJDXZ, pub_qyryxx.CYZJDM, pub_qyryxx.CYZJ, pub_qyryxx.ZJHM, pub_qyryxx.ZZZHM, pub_qyryxx.ZZDZ, pub_qyryxx.GWBH, pub_qyryxx.GWMC, pub_qyryxx.GWZRMS, pub_qyryxx.SHOUJI, pub_qyryxx.LXDH, pub_qyryxx.JJLXR, pub_qyryxx.JJLXRDH,pub_qyryxx.GZDM, pub_qyryxx.GZ, pub_qyryxx.ZHIWU, pub_qyryxx.RZRQ, pub_qyryxx.CYRYZTDM, pub_qyryxx.CYRYZT, pub_qyryxx.ZXR, pub_qyryxx.ZXBZ, pub_qyryxx.ZXSJ, pub_qyryxx.LRSJ, pub_qyryxx.LRR, pub_qyryxx.LRDWBM, pub_qyryxx.LRDWMC, pub_qyryxx.HCDW, pub_qyryxx.HCR, pub_qyryxx.HCSJ, pub_qyryxx.ZXYY, pub_qyryxx.ZKZT, pub_qyryxx.BCSJ, pub_qyryxx.DCBS, pub_qyryxx.BZ, pub_qyryxx.SCBZ, pub_qyryxx.BIDUIFLAG, pub_qyryxx.ZPWTGYY, pub_qyryxx.ZT, pub_qyryxx.LZRQ, pub_qyryxx.XXDM, pub_qyryxx.XX, pub_qyryxx.CYLBDM, pub_qyryxx.CYLB, pub_qyryxx.WHCDDM, pub_qyryxx.WHCD, pub_qyryxx.YJBZ, pub_qyryxx.YJSJ, pub_qyryxx.XZDXZQH, pub_qyryxx.XZDXZQHDM, pub_qyryxx.DJRQ, pub_qyryxx.HJLBDM,pub_qyryxx.HJLBMC, pub_qyryxx.ZZMMDM, pub_qyryxx.ZZMMMC, pub_qyryxx.SBZT, pub_qyryxx.ZYJNZSH, pub_qyryxx.KDYWYZYZGZHM, pub_qyryxx.SFYSPK
mapper.select: select max(pub_qyryxx.cyrybh) from pub_qyryxx left join pub_qyjbxx on pub_qyryxx.QYID=pub_qyjbxx.QYID where pub_qyryxx.QYID=#{qyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from pub_qyryxx left join pub_qyjbxx on pub_qyryxx.QYID=pub_qyjbxx.QYID
pub_qyjbxx.QYMC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{qymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyjbxx.GXDWMC like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{gxdwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyjbxx.GXDWBM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{gxdwbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyjbxx.HYLBDM = #{hylbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND pub_qyryxx.XM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyryxx.XB like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyryxx.XBDM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{xbdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyryxx.ZJHM like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyryxx.CYRYBH like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{cyrybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND pub_qyryxx.SCBZ != 1
order by pub_qyryxx.RYID DESC
mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(ryid),0)+1 from pub_qyryxx
